headline: Jihadist pleads guilty to destroying ancient Timbuktu artifacts
content: By Tiffany Ap, CNNUpdated 1719 GMT (0119 HKT) August 22, 2016  (CNN)In a historic first, the International Criminal Court has classified destroying cultural artifacts as a war crime.Such attacks affect humanity as a whole.Fatou Bensouda, International Criminal Court prosecutorCNN's Margot Haddad, Sheena McKenzie and Radina Gigova contributed to this report.
